author: olegk
msg: HTTPCLIENT-1008: send all variants' ETags on "variant miss"
Contributed by Michajlo Matijkiw <michajlo_matijkiw at comcast.com> and Mohammed Azeem Uddin <mohammedazeem_uddin at comcast.com>

author: cwiklik
msg: UIMA-1902 Modified sendReply() used by JmsInputChannel implementation to throw an exception if there is a send failure while attempting to send an ACK msg to a client. If a failure occurs the JmsInputChannel drops the msg since most likely a client has gone away.

author: yonik
msg: SOLR-2142: fix PagedBytes for copying zero-len BytesRef

author: cwiklik
msg: UIMA-1902 Added   public boolean send(final Message aMessage, long msgSize, boolean startTimer, boolean failOnJMSException) to enable propagation of send failures. Previously, send failures were just logged internally in the class and not exposed to the caller.
